title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
The Market share of Name Other is 5.98% larger than the minimum value at Plush toys.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
The Market share of Name Other is 5.98% larger than the minimum value at Plush toys.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
The second highest Market share is appeared to be the Name Infant/Pre-school toys.
The highest value at Name Other is 5.98x times more than the lowest value at Plush toys.
The Name Other has the highest Market share, followed by Infant/Pre-school toys, and Activity toys. Down to the Name Plush toys which is the lowest.
The average Market share in all 7 Names is 14.29.
